title: Beachfront Seychelles Private Pool Villas with Five Restaurants & Onsite Spa
description:
Dive into the lap of luxury at this opulent private villa resort, nestled on the island of Praslin, famously known as the 'Garden of Eden'. This island sanctuary puts indulgence centre stage, with just 87 intimate villas that cascade down the hillside, a jaw-dropping ocean-view spa, 24-hour butler service and double infinity pool. Sample the craftsmanship of the island's chefs across five restaurants and bars, enjoying breakfast by the ocean at Losean Restaurant or exquisite seafood at The Sushi Room, or ask your butler to arrange for a sunset picnic on the sand.  

Just a short hop from Mahé, Praslin is your ticket to some of the world's most incredible beaches and rare wildlife. From the picture-perfect sands of Anse Lazio to exploring the ancient wonders of Vallée de Mai, every moment here is a postcard come to life. Unplug and unwind as you're nourished by nature while enjoying the five-star facilities.
